Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
Controller.HomeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class HomeController extends Object implements Controller
Home Controller Class for the Main Application Page

    Home Controller Constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addMessageToChatHistory(String msg, SPEAKER speaker)
    addMessageToChatHistory() will update the chat area with either input questions from the user or responses from the LLM method call directly to the view to update this area
    void
    createQuery(String msg)
    Gathers user input message from the HomeView and device information from the HomeModel for query formulation message from the user will be pushed to the Chat History Element in HomeView Message from the user and device details from deviceList will be sent to HomeModel for REST API Call The response from the RESTAPI (sendQueryToLLM) will be added to the ChatHistory
    ArrayList<Wearables>
    getDeviceList()
    Getter for the Wearable Device List from the Model
    void
    go()
    go() Initialize and show the home page of the application Welcome Message to be presented by Pulsey method call to set up all action event listeners from the HomeView
    void
    showDevicePage()
    will update the homeView to show the device page if the user selects the devices button in the navigation panel

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • HomeController

      public HomeController(HomeView homeView, HomeModel homeModel)
      Home Controller Constructor
      Parameters:
      homeView - - HomeView instance for method calls to the main page GUI
      homeModel - - HomeModel instance for method calls for REST API and LLMs

  • Method Details

    • go

      public void go()
      go() Initialize and show the home page of the application Welcome Message to be presented by Pulsey method call to set up all action event listeners from the HomeView
      Specified by:
      go in interface Controller

    • addMessageToChatHistory

      public void addMessageToChatHistory(String msg, SPEAKER speaker)
      addMessageToChatHistory() will update the chat area with either input questions from the user or responses from the LLM method call directly to the view to update this area
      Parameters:
      msg - - message to be added to the HomeView
      speaker - - SPEAKER field to define who is sending this message

    • createQuery

      public void createQuery(String msg)
      Gathers user input message from the HomeView and device information from the HomeModel for query formulation message from the user will be pushed to the Chat History Element in HomeView Message from the user and device details from deviceList will be sent to HomeModel for REST API Call The response from the RESTAPI (sendQueryToLLM) will be added to the ChatHistory
      Parameters:
      msg - - message from the user input field in the HomeView

    • getDeviceList

      public ArrayList<Wearables> getDeviceList()
      Getter for the Wearable Device List from the Model
      Returns:
      - Device list comprising of all sub-class instances of the Wearable interface

    • showDevicePage

      public void showDevicePage()
      will update the homeView to show the device page if the user selects the devices button in the navigation panel
